DataElement.preferredName: Patient Standard Therapeutic Procedure Disease Progression Or Negation Standard Therapeutic Procedure Extend Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates that a patient meets the eligibility criteria regarding experiencing disease progression while on a standard therapy or no standard therapy extends patient survival for that patient's particular diagnosis.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Standard Therapeutic Procedure Disease Progression Or Negation Standard Therapeutic Procedure Extend Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Regularly and widely used._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._The worsening of a disease over time._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Regularly and widely used._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._To increase in length or duration._Continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions; includes methods and philosophy of survival._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Standard Therapeutic Procedure Disease Progression Or Negation Standard Therapeutic Procedure Extend Survival Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Regularly and widely used.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:The worsening of a disease over time.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Regularly and widely used.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:To increase in length or duration.:Continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions; includes methods and philosophy of survival.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
A process that manifests as the worsening of a disease over time.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
To increase in length or duration.
Continuance of life or existence especially under adverse conditions; includes methods and philosophy of survival.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient either progressed
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient either progressed on at least one standard therapy or there is no standard treatment that has been shown to prolong survival for the patient's  disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Are there no curative or life prolonging treatment available?
